comments: She\'s a great teacher. She gives clear expectations. If you\'re absent a lot she will drop you, which is fair. Her lectures are very well put together, and if you don\'t understand something she doesn\'t mind having to explain multiple times. She provides extra credit all semester long. No one can say they completed all EC and still failed.

comments: She knows her stuff I\'ll give her that. But the way she curves the grades is with extra credit. Homework is extra credit as well as daily quizzes. She\'s pretty condescending and doesn\'t understand that students don\'t automatically understand concepts being taught. She has made remarks about students that made them feel dumb for asking questions.

comments: She\'s not bad but she does go pretty fast. She gives lecture notes online and she goes through stuff in class. She likes to "RUN" meaning that she want to go through every section in the book ASAP so she can review everything on the end. She usually solves the problem in her head so a person needs to know what she is already doing. Just be prepared

comments: Basically she gives you extra credit which you\'d think is a good thing but she grades hard on tests/exams . I\'d much rather have a profess that doesn\'t grade as hard and no extra credit. Some student I knew did do well in her class. though these were the A students that do well most classes. If your a B/C student like me I\'d someone else.

If you\'re into that kinda thing, shes the right person to go to (especially if you\'re proficient in math). AND SHE DOES ANSWER YOUR QUESTIONS!!! -.-

comments: Dr. O is not the worst, but def. not the best! If you and math don\'t get along I wouldn\'t recommend her! She teaches ok, but goes really fast, and expects you to know it like she does. I don\'t know if it\'s her fault or if it\'s required by the school. Students will correct her often, or they will show her a shorter way to do the math.

comments: Math has always been my worst subject and for me Professor Ovanessian was perfect. She is always available by email to help you and she will get back to you almost immediately. She is also available to help before class. She does have an accent but I had no problem understanding her. She takes her time and explains the concepts very well.

comments: DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! I repeat, DO NOT take Ovanessian. She is rude and acts like she doesn\'t want to be there. She acts like a drill instructor.
